problem2

Class Decks

  • java.lang.Object
    • problem2.Decks
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Deck

    public class Decks
extends java.lang.Object
implements Deck
    Creates a standard deck of cards which holds 52 cards. The rank order and suit order remains the same as mentioned in Ranks and Suits java class. Performs various operations on the deck of cards generated.
    Author:
    meghna
